message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "PSU and capital goods led the tape. BHEL and PSU banks (UNIONBANK, IDBI) showed strong momentum into Friday on rising volumes. Defence (BEL) strengthened with a high-volume breakout. IT was mixed; FMCG (Dabur/Marico) softened mid-week. Telecom infra (Indus Towers) rolled over late week. Overall breadth in smallcaps improved, with cyclicals (metals/PSUs) firming.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "shares": 5,
      "amount": 1818.00,
      "reason": "Two consecutive weak sessions, Friday close near weekly lows and below 370 support; rotate to stronger momentum names."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 4261.00,
      "reason": "High-volume breakout to new weekly highs; defence strength and relative outperformance vs broader market."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BHEL",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 2654.90,
      "reason": "Three-day momentum surge with heavy volumes; close near highs signals continuation potential."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 1038.00,
      "reason": "PSU banks rebounded Friday with strong volume; IDBI reclaimed prior breakdown area, offering low-priced exposure."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.30,
    "total_value": 26475.85,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "LTF: 30 units",
      "BEL: 20 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units",
      "BHEL: 10 units",
      "IDBI: 10 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.7%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove PEL: zero liquidity all week (suspended/illiquid), not actionable for our mandate",
    "Remove IDEA: sub-₹10 high-volatility penny behavior; risk/impact not suitable for the portfolio"
  ]
